title: My microphone doesn't work at all in my pixel 2 xl
content:
This day i tried to use my pixel 2 xl and i found out that the mic doesn't work .. it work's when recording video but in phone calls it don't 
i tried to contact with the support but the chat option won't show up 
the problem is there is no google stores in my country and i don't know what should i do with it
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
